root.description: The connection to the ui5 resources folder

endpoints.description: endpoints of the api. List the json files here which should be parsed.

typeMap.description: A key-value map, which will be checked againt the types coming from the api reference json. If matched, they will be replaced.

enums.description: Used to replace namespaces with enums, but not used anymore. Do not delete this property, even though empty.

substitutedTypes.description: Key-value pairs, which manually declare built-in-types. The value will be put in its own d.ts file.

cleanParamNames.description: Replaces any method and event parameter name listed here.

additionalProperties.description: Key Value pairs to replace bad parameter names in methods and functions

cacheApis.description: Set this parameter to true to cache the api.json files locally. Thus, changes in the ui5 documentation will not be reflected anymore in the resulting declarations.

logLevel.description: Sets the loglevel of the parser.

postProcessing.description: Post Processing regular expression replacements, which will be applied to the outcoming modules

searchString.description: String to search for. Can either be a string or an regular expression. Set isRegex to true to use as regular expression.

replacement.description: The value to replace. If Regular Expression is true the groups can be accessed with $1, $2, etc. $0 is the whole string (as in js string replace)

isRegex.description: If this is set to true the searchString property is interpreted as regular expression

regexFlags.description: Regex flags are used, if isRegex is set to true.
